name: developer-portal
description: This project aims to integrate the latest version of Wordpress with Mashery's API Management Service. It is composed of three parts:

scripts.start: vagrant resume && docker -H $npm_package_docker_host start $npm_package_name-$npm_package_version && sleep 5 && docker ps -a --filter="name=$npm_package_name-$npm_package_version"
scripts.stop: docker -H $npm_package_docker_host stop $npm_package_name-$npm_package_version && sleep 5 && docker ps -a --filter="name=$npm_package_name-$npm_package_version" && vagrant suspend
